tool_description: Identifies and validates potential biomarkers from multi-omics data by correlating molecular signatures with clinical outcomes and disease states.

omics_data_paths.description: Paths to omics datasets (genomics, proteomics, metabolomics files)

clinical_outcomes.description: Clinical outcome variables or phenotypes to correlate with

sample_metadata.description: Path to sample metadata file with clinical annotations

biomarker_type.description: Biomarker application: diagnostic, prognostic, predictive, or pharmacodynamic

feature_selection_method.description: Feature selection algorithm: LASSO, Random_Forest, or mutual_information

cross_validation_folds.description: Number of cross-validation folds for model validation

significance_threshold.description: Statistical significance threshold for biomarker selection

min_auc_score.description: Minimum AUC score required for biomarker validation

max_biomarkers.description: Maximum number of biomarkers to return

include_combinations.description: Include biomarker combinations in addition to individual markers

error_messages: Omics data file not found: One or more specified omics data files could not be accessed.
Clinical metadata mismatch: Sample IDs in omics data don't match those in clinical metadata file.
Invalid biomarker type: Use diagnostic, prognostic, predictive, or pharmacodynamic.
Unsupported feature selection: Use LASSO, Random_Forest, or mutual_information methods.
Invalid cross-validation folds: Must be between 3 and 10 for reliable validation.
Invalid threshold values: significance_threshold must be 0.001-0.1, min_auc_score must be 0.5-1.0.
Insufficient samples: Need at least 50 samples for reliable biomarker discovery.
No significant biomarkers found: Consider relaxing thresholds or checking data quality.
usage: Provide omics_data_paths, clinical_outcomes, and sample_metadata. Configure biomarker discovery parameters including type, selection method, and validation criteria. Returns validated biomarker candidates with performance metrics.

biomarker_candidates.description: List of identified biomarker molecules or signatures

auc_scores.description: AUC performance scores for each biomarker candidate

p_values.description: Statistical significance p-values for each biomarker

validation_metrics.description: Summary of cross-validation results and performance metrics

biomarker_combinations.description: Optimal biomarker combinations if include_combinations is enabled
